description: zNibble ringtone creator is webOS's first ever full ringtone creation app. zNibble ringtone creator allows you to make ringtones (up to one minute long) of any part, of any song, you currently have on your webOS device, Palm Pre, Palm Pixie, Palm Pre Plus and Palm Pre 2. An INTERNET CONNECTION IS REQUIRED. Making ringtones is easy with zNibble. It's fun and easy to use. Just slide your left handle to where you want your ringtone to start in the song, and slide your right handle to where you want the ringtone to end in the song, press create, and shortly thereafter your ringtone will automatically be put into your Sounds & Ringtones location on your phone. Add special effects to your ringtones such as, reverse play, fade in and out, speed control and more!
